item.title: 5 things I’ve learned building data products
item.description: It’s been a little over two years since I joined Mozn, where we build data-driven products that change the way our users work. In 2017, we were 5x smaller than we are now and were navigating the uncertainty of starting a data science practice from scratch. Today, we still enjoy wading through uncertainty in many domains, but I think we’ve developed a decent understanding of how to design and build data products.
